text: illeogalodoe hananimgwa seonjija-ege sunjonghala neohuiga geoyeoghanda hadeolado geubun-egeneun geubun-ege jueojin immue daehan chaeg-imppun-imyeo neo huineun neohuiege jueojin uimuga iss nola man-il neohuiga geubun-ege sunjong handamyeon neohuiga eulbaleun gillo indo doel geos-ila seonjijaneun mesejileul jeon dalhaneun uimubakk-en eobsnola
